description_short: Decent offensive cooldown and Rage generation tool. It is not great on its own, but it is good wi...
description_full: Decent offensive cooldown and Rage generation tool. It is not great on its own, but it is good with the talent synergy below. Grants 20 rage. It deals slightly more single-target damage than Ravager, but less AoE damage.

description_short: Reactive defensive cooldown that provides a ton of damage reduction and increased healing taken. ...
description_full: Reactive defensive cooldown that provides a ton of damage reduction and increased healing taken. The 3-minute cooldown is long. After FINALLY being fixed in 10.2.7, this Talent is properly useful for new players and may have niche applications in high keys as a planned defensive. Great tool to recover from a mistake or generally when in trouble.

description_short: This talent randomly sends out more frequent and shorter versions of  Ravager.
